FKE Seminar Series – Prof. Dr. Surender Reddy Salkuti
=====================================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Feb 13, 2025 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/w-Dr-Hasmat-980x551.jpeg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All academic staff and students are cordially invited to attend a webinar co-organized by the FKE Seminar Committee and the IEEE Power Electronics Society (Malaysia Chapter), scheduled as follows:  
Speaker: Prof. Dr. Surender Reddy Salkuti  
Title: Sustainable Development with Renewable Energy and Electric Vehicle Technologies  
Date: 27 February 2025 (Thursday)  
Time: 2:30 PM – 4:00 PM  
Moderator: Dr Hasmat Malik

Meeting link: [HERE](https://utm.webex.com/utm/j.php?MTID=m393f51cb0c71241b0a23f4c10384ab9b)
  
Meeting number: 2513 030 5733  
Meeting password: drJnqJ36q23

We are looking forward to your participation. Thank you.

(CPD hour is awarded to staff, postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement, certificate of attendance will be provided)
